title: Lincoln Electric Leather Welding Gloves KH641, Premium Hand Protection from Welder and Cutting Torch Heat, Commercial Quality, Cotton Lined, Gauntlet Cuff, Unisex, Grey, One Size
descriptions:
Introducing the Lincoln Electric Leather Welding Gloves KH641 - the ultimate hand protection for welders and cutting torch enthusiasts! These premium gloves are designed to provide heavy-duty protection, ensuring your hands stay safe and secure in any welding environment.

With their heat resistance and flame resistance, these gloves are built to withstand the toughest welding conditions. The cotton lining adds an extra layer of comfort and protection, making them perfect for long hours of work.

The fully welted seams and lock-stitch construction guarantee durability, ensuring these gloves will last you for a long time. The winged thumb design allows for maximum flexibility and ease of movement, giving you the freedom to tackle any welding task with precision.

Crafted from split cowhide grade A leather on the exterior and lined with soft cotton fleece on the interior, these gloves offer superior comfort and protection. The gauntlet cuff style with a length of 13.5 inches provides additional coverage and protection for your wrists and forearms.

These gloves are suitable for various applications, including MIG welding and stick welding. They are designed to be unisex, making them the perfect choice for both men and women.

Each package contains one pair of gloves, ensuring you have everything you need to get the job done. The one size fits most design makes it easy to find the perfect fit for your hands. Available in a stylish gray color, these gloves will not only protect you but also make you look good while doing it!

Invest in the Lincoln Electric Leather Welding Gloves KH641 and experience the ultimate hand protection for welders. Don't compromise on safety - choose quality, durability, and style. Order your pair today!
